Package pieces

Class piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
bishop, king, knight, pawn, queen, rook
public abstract class piece
extends java.lang.Object
Represent a chess piece
Author:
Parth Patel, Amanda Kang

  • Constructor Details

    • piece

      public piece​(java.lang.String name, boolean isBlack)
      Create a piece with a given name and coloe
      Parameters:
      name - Can be anything from (K)ing, (Q)ueen, (p)awn, k(N)ight, (B)ishop or (R)ook
      isBlack - true for black piece and false for white

    • valid_move

      public abstract boolean valid_move​(board game, point origin, point destination)
      This method validates whether a move on a given board for a given piece is legal or not
      Parameters:
      game - A chess board with a given state
      origin - The origin of the move
      destination - The destination of the move
      Returns:
      Whether or not the move is valid

      Creates a copy of a given piece.

      The new piece.
